segments.text: Peek-a-Boo! I can see you, and I know what you do.
So put your hands on your face, and cover up your eyes.
Don't look until I signal. Peek-a-Boo!
Ha ha ha ha! Ha ha ha ha!
Peek-a-Boo! Ha ha ha ha!
Peek-a-Boo!
The way that we work is what we become, so please pay attention while I show you some of what's about to happen.
Peek-a-Boo! I know what you do, cause I do it too.
So put your hands on your face, and cover up your eyes.
Don't look until I signal. Peek-a-Boo!
Ha ha ha ha! Ha ha ha ha!
Peek-a-Boo! Ha ha ha ha!
Peek-a-Boo!
Laugh if you want to, or say you don't care. If you cannot see it, you think it's not there. It doesn't work that way. Peek-a-Boo!
I can see you, and I know what you do.
So put your hands on your face, and cover up your eyes.
Don't look until I signal. Peek-a-Boo!
Ha ha ha ha! Ha ha ha ha!
Peek-a-Boo! Ha ha ha ha!
Ha ha ha ha!
Peek-a-Boo!
The winner we want, is what we'll become. So please pay attention while I show you some, of what's about to happen.
Peek-a-Boo!
